Module jGame
Package jGame.core.entity.event

Class CollisionEvent

java.lang.Object
jGame.core.entity.event.CollisionEvent
public class CollisionEvent
extends java.lang.Object
A collision event created when a colision happens between any 2 entities or the entity and the walls.
Since:
1.0.0
Author:
Nuno Pereira

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes

    static class  CollisionEvent.CollisionType
    Represents the type of this collision.

  • Constructor Details

    • CollisionEvent

      public CollisionEvent​(Entity source, Entity target, java.lang.String eventText, int x, int y, CollisionEvent.CollisionType collisionType)
      Instantiates a new CollisionEvent with the given parameters.
      Parameters:
      source - the source of the collision event (must be an entity)
      target - the target of the collision event (can be null, representing the walls)
      eventText - the text associated with this collision
      x - the x location where the collision happened
      y - the y location where the collision happened
      collisionType - the type of collision that happened
      Since:
      1.0.0
